issue.title: [Doc] Add example of List with nested child type in format specification documents
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-2623](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2623). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Per recent mailing list discussion. We do have an example of a `List<List<Primitive>>` but it might help to have an example with a struct child type or something else
